results.title: Mandrin (Cinemascope Print)
results.brief_description:
Mandrin is a French version of Robin Hood, a man who decides to deal in his own way with greedy tax collectors and redistribute the wealth to the people.

Credits: Director, Jean-Paul Le Chanois ; writers, Jean-Paul Le Chanois, Rene Havard, Claude Desailly, Lois Martin.
Cast: Georges Riviere, Silvia Montfort, Armand Mestral, Dany Robin, Maurice Baquet, Georges Wilson.

results.title: Mandrake the Magician. Vol. 02
results.creator_credit: Columbia Pictures, Norman Deming and Sam Nelson
results.brief_description: The comics’ crimefighting prestidigitator comes to the screen in this thrill-laden serial as Mandrake (Warren Hull) and his African sidekick Lothar (Al Kikume) help a noted scientist protect his radium-energy machine from a sinister criminal genius known as the Wasp. Doris Weston and Forbes Murray co-star.

results.title: Mandragora [Widescreen] (E)
results.creator_credit: Prague Film Enterprises, Jaraslav Stanek, Petr Heinvosky, Miroslav Steinbach and Wiktor Grodecki
results.brief_description: The director of this film has worked most of the 1990s with the young prostitutes and homeless in Prague, making a series of documentaries examining the development of the sex trade industry in the Czech Republic. The feature length film uses the conventions of melodrama and neo-realism (non-professional actors, real locations) in order to make a powerful statement against the corruption and exploitation of young people in market-obsessed post-Communist Prague. Sixteen year old Mark arrives in Prague after running away from his country town and within hours has begun life as a street prostitute. The film represents a dark labyrinth world where adults prey on children and where the only moments of tenderness rest in the relationships formed between the young boys. But in a world of random violence and theft, of corrupt pornographers and pimps, of desperate drug use and sexual disease, and in a world where the foreign tourist is most often a pedophile, moments of tenderness are few and far between. In Czech with English subtitles.

results.title: Mandela
results.brief_description: This film combines striking film segments and photographs with dramatic footage of daily life in black South African townships and riveting interviews with Winnie Mandela to tell the unique story of her life as wife of imprisoned ANC leader Nelson Mandela and the foremost woman activist in the struggle against apartheid in South Africa.

results.title: Mandela
results.creator_credit: TVS, Channel 4, Dickie Bamber and Philip Saville
results.brief_description: A dramatisation of the early life and imprisonment of Nelson Mandela, made even more relevant since his release. Twenty five years ago in the bloody aftermath of the Sharpeville massacre, Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela was arrested, tried and sentenced to life imprisonment. His visionary struggle culminated in a worldwide crescendo of protest. A film of many dimensions, it is one of a yearning for justice and freedom not only of black South Africans, but of all peoples fighting injustice worldwide. Starring Danny Glover as Nelson Mandela and Alfre Woodard as Winnie Mandela. Co-starring John Matshikiza, Warren Clarke, Allan Corduner, Nathan Dambuza Mdledle and Julian Glover.

results.title: Manas: a beautiful sanctuary in Assam
results.brief_description: A game sanctuary near the Bhutan border, and the many creatures it protects. Deer, elephants, rhino, buffaloes etc and a rare new species of golden langur discovered in the course of making this film.

results.title: Managing your time effectively
results.brief_description: Presented by Dr. Adrian Geering and designed to assist staff in clarifying their responsibilities and effectively delegating work. Demonstrates organisational strategies to maximise productivity from available time.
